t: Amazon Games Is Making A New Lord Of The Rings MMORPG | MMORPG.com
s: May 15, 2023 - Amazon Games Orange County has MMO experience, as they are the team responsible for developing New World, which launched in 2021 on PC. The upcoming Middle-earth based MMO is still in the pre-production stage, which means that it's only a small team at the New World studio working so far.

t: Exclusive: Amazon Games Boss Says Lord of the Rings MMO 'Still Early,' Calls Tomb Raider a 'Huge, Huge Task' - IGN
s: August 24, 2024 - In an exclusive interview with IGN, Amazon Games boss Christoph Hartmann talked about the label's plans in the wake of revealing King of Meat, a new hack-and-slash co-op game that Hartmann calls Amazon's "first step out of the MMO genre" as it seeks to expand its publishing portfolio.

t: Official New World: Aeternum Website
s: New World: Aeternum is an action RPG set on the supernatural island of Aeternum. Forge your destiny on an adventure filled with danger and opportunity.

t: Lord of the Rings MMO Coming From New World Developer Amazon Games - IGN
s: May 16, 2023 - Amazon Games Orange County, the team behind New World, is leading development on the new MMO, which will come to PC and consoles.

t: Amazon Games Orange County Developing Lord of the Rings MMO Inspired by J.R.R. Tolkien's Works
s: May 20, 2023 - The game is still in the early stages of development, and no release date has been announced. With Amazon Games working on eight other projects, it may be some time before more information is released. Fans of the brand are awaiting the new MMO, hoping for a smoother debut than previous attempts.
